text:
Hello,

I have written a Joomla plugin that fills out a form on Hubsport using the API.
I have set up a private app for this and send my data via POST using the following URL:

<https://api.hsforms.com/submissions/v3/integration/submit/portalId/formId>

As long as I use a local development environment under Localhost / PHP 7.4 or 8.0 and submit the form, everything goes without problems and I also find my form submission in HubSpot.

If I now put the page online with exactly the same code, I get a 404 error from HubSpot without any further error information.

Among other things, I have already opened a support ticket, but I had hoped that they might be able to help me here.

Many thanks

Reminder: Don’t forget to keep your HubSpot CLI up to date to ensure you have the latest CLI features, bug/usability fixes and performance improvements. • <https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/cms/developer-reference/local-development-cli#upgrade|How to upgrade your CLI to the latest version>.
